titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8259

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
Adjutant Generals' Office
Frankfort Ky:
4 Jan 1862

Hon: Nat Gaither Jr
Sec State-
The following Commissions which issued 16th November 1861_ should be charged to the 13th November 1861_ viz:

John M. Harlan Colonel ~
Wm H Hays Lt Colonel ~
Gabriel Wharton Major ~
Seth P. Bevill Captain ~
Buford R. Pennington Captain name also to be changed to Buford R. Pendleton-
William Tweddle Captain
Franklin L. Hill Captain
William R Hunter Captain
George W. Riley Captain
Andrew Thompson 1st Lieut
Clement Funk 2d --
Wm Shively 1st -- "
Henry W. Barry 2d --
Wm E. Kelly 1st --
John Myers 2d --
Henry Walter 1st Lieut: & name to be changed to Henry Waller
Richard Watts 2d Lieut
Charles W. McKay 1st Lieut
Ben R Smith 2d Lieut
Ed K Fenrill 2d Lieut
Wm Hupp 1st Lieut
Stephen W Dorsey 2d Liet and Commissions which issued 5th November 1861 should be 12 November 1861 viz:
John T. Milburn Captain
Robert S. Short 1st Lieut: and Commissions which issued 7th November 1861 should be 12 November 1861 viz:
Edward Hilp Captain
William L. Messen ^1st Lieut^ & name should be changed to William Messon
James E. Sallie ^2d Lieut:^ & name should be changed to James E. Sallee.
Commissions which issued 9th November 1861 should be 12th November 1861.
Henry I. Davidson^Capt^ & name should be changed to Henry G. Davidson
John Reynolds 1st Lieut: & name should be James Reynolds.
James Ester 2d Lieut: & name should be John Ester, and Commissions which issued 19 Novr 1861 to 13 Novr 1861-
Wm Akisson Surgeon
Tho. M Knott Asst. Surgeon
Saml Matlock Adjuant Quarter Mas
& Wm J. Lisle Adjutant-
This is a troublesome affair but I am pleased to say, it is not our fault_

I am
Respy
John W Finnell
Adjt Genl
